msg.msgText: The command to set EnableDiskPersistence failed. The CleanStore parameter is required.If EnableDiskPersistence is changed, the store must be cleaned.Run this command with the CleanStore parameter to clean the store.Cleaning the store deletes all persistent messaging data.

msgExplanation.p: imaserver set EnabledDiskPersistence is invoked without CleanStore parameter.

msgUserResponse.p: Run this command with the CleanStore parameter to clean the store.
